item.title: Data Analytics Compilation
item.description: News Classifier App: In this research project we took a political dataset from the 2016 US Presidential elections and created a machine learning model using Python to classify the news as REAL or FAKE. More … Data analytical review of the 911 Call incindents in 2016: Pennsylvania, US.: In this research I am analyzing the 911 call dataset in Pensylvania, US in 2016 using the Kaggle dataset for the analysis.

item.title: News Classifier App.
item.description: Tools: Python, Numpy, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Pyplot News Classifier Tools: Python, Numpy, Pandas, Itertools, Sklearn Summary In this research project we took a political dataset from the 2016 US Presidential elections and created a machine learning model using Python to classify the news as REAL or FAKE. We implemented a TfidfVectorizer, initialized a PassiveAggressiveClassifier, and fit our model. Finally, we run an uncertainty evaluation of the model to obtain the level of accuracy.

item.title: A NBA Statistical Analytical Research: Atlanta Hawks Roster. 2019-2020
item.description: In this study the main goal is to evaluate the concentrations of the modern piracy incidents around the world. Modern-day pirates around the world share the legal designation of their historic brethren as “enemies of all mankind” because they disrupt and hinder the safe navigation of maritime vessels containing goods and people. As we already know Piracy still exists in the 21st Century. Piracy is a global crime which impedes the free movement of ships containing people and goods, with its attendant economic ramifications.

item.title: Data analytical review of the 911 Call incindents in 2016: Pennsylvania, US.
item.description: Tools: Python, Numpy, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Pyplot In this research I am analyzing the 911 call dataset. Access to the source code here Data Source: Kaggle. The data contains the following fields( all are declared as a String variable): lat : Latitude lng: Longitude desc: Description of the Emergency zip: Zipcode title: Title timeStamp: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS twp: Township addr: Address e: Dummy variable (always 1) For the data analysis and visualisation we import all the dependencies.

item.title: GDP Analysis in the context of the economic development and income growth
item.description: Tools: Python, NumPy, BeautifulSoup I put together all the information related to the GDP and see it relationship per capita. It is already known that Per capita GDP is a metric that breaks down a country’s GDP per person and is calculated by dividing the GDP of a country by its population. Gross domestic product (GDP) is the market value of all final goods and services from a nation in a given year.

item.title: The 21st Century Piracy Phenomenon. Exploring Contemporary Sea Piracy
item.description: In this study the main goal is to evaluate the concentrations of the modern piracy incidents around the world. Modern-day pirates around the world share the legal designation of their historic brethren as “enemies of all mankind” because they disrupt and hinder the safe navigation of maritime vessels containing goods and people. As we already know Piracy still exists in the 21st Century. Piracy is a global crime which impedes the free movement of ships containing people and goods, with its attendant economic ramifications.

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: What I Do? I enjoy having a “White Hat Hacker” attitude and mentality. This type of personality leads me to have a set of practical experiences with a wide range of technologies. See below in the following selection of what I have worked on. Data Mining. Data Analytics. Data visualization. Programming languages. Math & Statistics. Machine Learning. Integrated development environment (IDE). Data cloud deployment.
